description:
The gate to another world is finally opened, and Tokyo begins to collapse!
As Chihiro and his allies head to the location of their final confrontation in order to end it all, a terrifying enemy blocks their path...!
Were the stars aligned against them? Was this always destined to happen?
Their hearts that are drawn to one another and the love they`ve nurtured are washed away by the massive waves of fate, and they are confronted with sadness.
How will the story of the couple that has continually resisted fate end...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The World Is Vast and Infinite
世界は広く, 果てしない
